main.name: Stanley Luong
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Junior Developer, Technical Community Manager
work.description: Maintained security for hundreds of websites with SSL certificates. Automated data population of catalog for thousands of products. Served as Project Management lead helping to oversee the technical team's backlog and roadmap.

work.title: Frontend Development Intern
work.description: Focused on user experience and designed responsive web based user-friendly interfaces. Troubleshot known issues and upgraded frontend features

work.title: Coding Tutor
work.description: Taught clients programming fundamentals and advised client based on their needs. Coached clients through project & conducted code reviews.

work.title: Data Specialist
work.description: Preprocessing, analyzing, and annotating visual data for a confidential project. Maintained confidentiality, trained hirees, collaborated with peers to achieve performance goals.

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
